comments:

tptp.runtime-TPTP-4.2.0-200605190100.zip

The problem happens also when BIRT and its dependencies are included.
This problem occurs because the TestReport constructor instantiates a class that uses a BIRT class.  The instantiation of this class should not happen in the constructor.
Removed BIRT instantiation from the constructor.  Instantiation happens after checking if BIRT is installed.
Please ignore comment #1. I rerun the test cases, and report works when BIRT plugins are included.

Sheldon,
Should the extension point lookup code skip any failing extension point instead of blocking the whole Report feature from working also?
Yes that's probably the correct behavior.  Can you open another bug.
*** Bug 143844 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
